text: Moses guigira Fhe Bakɨme khothɨgap, ana maaŋ muuŋgiap Idzɨp thav khavgi. Idzɨvar ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan guigira ana nzuav dav shigim, ana mba ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman panan rivgi fhuvara. Khueŋ guigira, nza gumgi nza wari won rɨmgira, nza Fhe Bakɨme gangirga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Moses, ana zazera Fhe Bakɨme gari fara muuŋgiap, guigira khaŋ tɨga havhargi.
